message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique, and I think you'll find it's well worth the investment.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a budget and I need to make sure it fits within my means.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid I can't accept $7500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
